verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* when they had passed \w through|strong="G1353"\w* \w Amphipolis|strong="G0295"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Apollonia|strong="G0624"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Thessalonica|strong="G2332"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w as|strong="G2596"\w* his manner \w was|strong="G1486"\w*, went \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* sabbath \w days|strong="G4521"\w* \w reasoned|strong="G1256"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*,

\w Opening|strong="G1272"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w alleging|strong="G3908"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* must \w needs|strong="G1163"\w* have \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* risen \w again|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w preach|strong="G2605"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w believed|strong="G3982"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w consorted|strong="G4345"\w* with \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of the \w devout|strong="G4576"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of the \w chief|strong="G4413"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w few|strong="G3641"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* believed \w not|strong="G0544"\w*, moved with \w envy|strong="G2206"\w*, took unto \w them|strong="G4355"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w lewd|strong="G4190"\w* \w fellows|strong="G0435"\w* of the baser \w sort|strong="G0060"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gathered a \w company|strong="G3792"\w*, and set \w all|strong="G2350"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* on an \w uproar|strong="G2350"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w assaulted|strong="G2186"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* of \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w*, and \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G0071"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w people|strong="G1218"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, they \w drew|strong="G4951"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the rulers of the \w city|strong="G4173"\w*, \w crying|strong="G0994"\w*, \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* have \w turned|strong="G0387"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w* upside \w down|strong="G0387"\w* are \w come|strong="G3918"\w* \w hither|strong="G1759"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*;

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w* hath \w received|strong="G5264"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w contrary|strong="G0561"\w* to the \w decrees|strong="G1378"\w* of \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* that there \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w king|strong="G0935"\w*, \add one\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the rulers of the \w city|strong="G4173"\w*, when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w taken|strong="G2983"\w* \w security|strong="G2425"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w other|strong="G3062"\w*, they \w let|strong="G0630"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w go|strong="G0630"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* sent \w away|strong="G1599"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Berea|strong="G0960"\w*: \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w coming|strong="G3854"\w* \add thither\add* \w went|strong="G0549"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* more \w noble|strong="G2104"\w* than \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Thessalonica|strong="G2332"\w*, in \w that|strong="G3748"\w* they \w received|strong="G1209"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* readiness of \w mind|strong="G4288"\w*, and \w searched|strong="G0350"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* those \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w were|strong="G2192"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*; \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of \w honourable|strong="G2158"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1674"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w few|strong="G3641"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Thessalonica|strong="G2332"\w* had \w knowledge|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* was \w preached|strong="G2605"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Berea|strong="G0960"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* thither \w also|strong="G2546"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* stirred \w up|strong="G4531"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* sent \w away|strong="G1821"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* to \w go|strong="G4198"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w abode|strong="G5278"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w still|strong="G5278"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that \w conducted|strong="G2525"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* \w Athens|strong="G0116"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w receiving|strong="G2983"\w* a \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w for|strong="G2443"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G5613"\w* all \w speed|strong="G5033"\w*, they \w departed|strong="G1826"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* while \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w waited|strong="G1551"\w* for \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Athens|strong="G0116"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* was \w stirred|strong="G3947"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w when|strong="G5607"\w* he \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* wholly given to \w idolatry|strong="G2712"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* disputed \w he|strong="G1256"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* with the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* with the devout \w persons|strong="G4576"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w market|strong="G0058"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* met with \w him|strong="G3909"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w philosophers|strong="G5386"\w* of the \w Epicureans|strong="G1946"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Stoicks|strong="G4770"\w*, \w encountered|strong="G4820"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w babbler|strong="G4691"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*? other \w some|strong="G3588"\w*, He \w seemeth|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* a setter \w forth|strong="G2604"\w* of \w strange|strong="G3581"\w* \w gods|strong="G1140"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* they \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and brought \w him|strong="G0071"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w Areopagus|strong="G0697"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w May|strong="G1410"\w* we \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*, \w whereof|strong="G5259"\w* \w thou|strong="G4675"\w* \w speakest|strong="G2980"\w*, \add is\add*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* thou \w bringest|strong="G1533"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w strange|strong="G3579"\w* things \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w ears|strong="G0189"\w*: we \w would|strong="G1014"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w mean|strong="G2309"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Athenians|strong="G0117"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strangers|strong="G3581"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w there|strong="G1927"\w* spent their \w time|strong="G2119"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w else|strong="G2087"\w*, but \w either|strong="G2228"\w* to \w tell|strong="G3004"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* new \w thing|strong="G2537"\w*.)

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w Mars’|strong="G0697"\w* \w hill|strong="G0697"\w*, and \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \add Ye\add* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Athens|strong="G0117"\w*, I \w perceive|strong="G2334"\w* that \w in|strong="G2596"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w are|strong="G5613"\w* too \w superstitious|strong="G1174"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as I passed \w by|strong="G1330"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beheld|strong="G0333"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w devotions|strong="G4574"\w*, I \w found|strong="G2147"\w* an \w altar|strong="G1041"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3739"\w* \w inscription|strong="G1924"\w*, TO THE \w UNKNOWN|strong="G0057"\w* \w GOD|strong="G2316"\w*. \w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* ye \w ignorantly|strong="G0050"\w* \w worship|strong="G2151"\w*, \w him|strong="G5126"\w* \w declare|strong="G2605"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* that \w made|strong="G4160"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w therein|strong="G0846"\w*, seeing that \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G5225"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w dwelleth|strong="G2730"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w temples|strong="G3485"\w* made with \w hands|strong="G5499"\w*;

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* is \w worshipped|strong="G2323"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* \w men’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, as though he \w needed|strong="G4326"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, seeing \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w breath|strong="G4157"\w*, \w and|strong="G2596"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* hath \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* for to \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, and hath \w determined|strong="G3724"\w* the \w times|strong="G2540"\w* before \w appointed|strong="G4384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w bounds|strong="G3734"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w habitation|strong="G2733"\w*;

That they should \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w haply|strong="G1065"\w* they might feel \w after|strong="G5584"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w though|strong="G2544"\w* he \w be|strong="G5225"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w far|strong="G3112"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* we \w live|strong="G2198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w move|strong="G2795"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have our \w being|strong="G2070"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* your \w own|strong="G5209"\w* \w poets|strong="G4163"\w* have \w said|strong="G2046"\w*, \w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* his \w offspring|strong="G1085"\w*.

Forasmuch \w then|strong="G3767"\w* as we \w are|strong="G5225"\w* the \w offspring|strong="G1085"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, we \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to think \w that|strong="G3543"\w* the \w Godhead|strong="G2304"\w* \w is|strong="G1511"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w silver|strong="G0696"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*, \w graven|strong="G5480"\w* by \w art|strong="G5078"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w device|strong="G1761"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3767"\w* the \w times|strong="G5550"\w* of this \w ignorance|strong="G0052"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* winked \w at|strong="G5237"\w*; \w but|strong="G3588"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w commandeth|strong="G3853"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* every \w where|strong="G3837"\w* to \w repent|strong="G3340"\w*:

\w Because|strong="G1360"\w* he hath \w appointed|strong="G2476"\w* a \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \add that\add* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w ordained|strong="G3724"\w*; \add whereof\add* he hath \w given|strong="G3930"\w* \w assurance|strong="G4102"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*, in that he hath \w raised|strong="G0450"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* of the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w mocked|strong="G5512"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, We will \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \add matter\add*.
\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G3319"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w clave|strong="G2853"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*: \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \add was\add* \w Dionysius|strong="G1354"\w* the \w Areopagite|strong="G0698"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Damaris|strong="G1152"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.
